author: dims
msg: Make Hi-Fi optional as this is a HUGE CPU and Memory Hog (see AXIS-1323). We'll have to bite the bullet and fix breakages that assume the a recorder is present always.
- will try to run all tests and fix tests that break in the next few days.

author: dims
msg: Performance enhancement as part of AXIS-1323 (Prevent unnecessary conversions of Message and streamline getEncoder a bit). Makes it a bit more faster but need to dig deeper.
